程序包 com.academic_assistant.service

类 UserService

java.lang.Object
com.academic_assistant.service.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
UserService handles the business logic related to user operations such as login, follow/unfollow, and email verification. 作者: KyrieLei524

    • login

      public String login(String jsonString)
      Logs in a user with the given credentials.
      参数:
      jsonString - the JSON string containing the user ID and password
      返回:
      the user details in JSON format if login is successful, otherwise null

      参数:

    • follow

      public String follow(String jsonString)
      Follows a user.
      参数:
      jsonString - the JSON string containing the ID of the user and the follow ID
      返回:
      true if the follow operation is successful, otherwise false

    • userInfoProcess

      public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject userInfoProcess(User user)
      Processes user information and generates a JSON object with additional details.
      参数:
      user - The user whose information is to be processed.
      返回:
      A JSON object containing the user's information, including: - likedNum: The total number of likes the user's posts have received. - mostTagName: The tag that appears most frequently in the user's posts. - mostTagNum: The number of times the most frequent tag appears. - hottestPost: The user's post with the most likes, including whether it is liked, followed, or collected by the user. - secondHotPost: TThe user's post with the second likes, including whether it is liked, followed, or collected by the user.
